markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Lao Shu Po (Old Rat Woman)](/Deities.aspx?ID=180)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 132 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Tian Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=16)

**Edicts** Work quietly toward your goals in the shadows, steal what you need, keep an ear among the ignored and downtrodden

**Anathema** Work honestly for something you could steal instead, risk too much for another creature

**Follower Alignments**
LE, N, NE, CE

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Dexterity or Intelligence

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146)

**Divine Skill** [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17)

**Favored Weapon** [Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3)

**Domains** [Darkness](/Domains.aspx?ID=6), [Luck](/Domains.aspx?ID=18), [Swarm](/Domains.aspx?ID=53), [Trickery](/Domains.aspx?ID=31)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Summon Animal](/Spells.aspx?ID=316)
(rodents only)

- **2nd**
[Knock](/Spells.aspx?ID=168)

- **3rd**
[Nondetection](/Spells.aspx?ID=209)

</column>
name: Lao Shu Po (Old Rat Woman)
